name: Solitaire Multiple
description:
Just like Solitaire, place the each card on the pile. If the card matches, it combines the cards. Try to get to 2048!

There are 4 piles, which you will quickly run out of. And don't place large numbers on smaller numbers, or you will be stuck.

A fun and stress free game that will keep you playing forever. Like all good games, easy to understand, but difficult to master.
